name: The Journal (mire89)
description:
Your search for hope led you to this island. Learn its history. Honor their history.

A game made for Asylum tribute jam 2019.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse Scroll - Scroll text

E - Read and close Messages

Game Design - The Team

Vojin Đorđević  - Visuals and animation

Slađan Milenović - SFX and Music

Lazar Tonić - Writing and Level design

Dušan Mirković - Programming
